name: Tower Of Depletion
description:
In this game, made for Mini Jam 128 : Health, you are a lone ranger that tries to climb a tower. The catch ? You always lose health, and the only way to regain it is to kill ennemies or climb higher. Will you beat the Tower Of Depletion ?

Here are a list of the shortcuts :

-A and S to move

-Space to jump

-Mouse1 to attack

-R to restart and Escape to quit the game

By the way, all the assets were made in the 72h jam timeframe. Have fun !
